name: Through Hostile Space
description:
The googly eyes have taken over the spaceship and they are creating obstacles in our way.
Help our blue slime with cat ears to reach the goal by jumping, dashing, shooting, walljumping and more. Every time it dies, it goes back to the last checkpoint reached and gets a skillpoint to learn a new skill from 3 skill trees, unless the 7 lives are gone, then it’s game over. 

Controls:
Mouse clicks on the menu buttons.  

Mouse + Keyboard:
Jump:                   Space bar
Dash:                    Left Shift
Shoot:                  Left Mouse button
Open Skill tree: Tab or “n”
Game Pause:     Enter

Gamepad:
Jump:                   Face Button Bottom (“A” on an Xbox controller)
Dash:                    Face Button Right (“B” on an Xbox controller), Right Shoulder or Right Trigger
Shoot:                  Face Button Left (“X” on an Xbox controller)
Open Skill tree: Face Button Top (“Y” on an Xbox controller)
Game Pause:     Gamepad Special Right (“Start” on an Xbox controller)

Known bugs:

  • While the game is playable with the controller, the menus and skill tree isn’t working with the controller. 
  • Having  googly eyes attached to many actors at the same time caused this project to crash. They are not googly anymore.
